channel.title: Unstructured text data on Tiny Little Things in Data Science
channel.description: Recent content in Unstructured text data on Tiny Little Things in Data Science

item.title: Text Complexity Analysis of Beatles Lyrics With R
item.description: The Beatles became hit through its powerful music but it is not famous for its poetry. But the group’s lyrics did change during the band’s short existence and we can use text analysis to track these changes. This post is about measuring the change in the complexity of the group’s lyrics, from Please, Please Me to Abbey Road, showing how we can use basic data secience tools to find really fancy patterns in unstructured text data.
